addr: 26300 Crenshaw Boulevard Palos Verdes Peninsula, CA 90274
title: MHS Class of 1986 Reunion
desc: Fun, connection, and oneness!! Miraleste High School Class of 1986 Reunion 30 years! Come experience the majesty of relationships--past, present, and future.   We want to be with you again...EVERYONE! Saturday, July 23rd South Coast Botanic Garden, in the Koi Pond Terrace 26300 Crenshaw Blvd., Palos Verdes Peninsula 3-5 p.m. Botanic Garden Touring and Family Visiting 5-10 p.m. (adults only) Food, Drinks, 80's Music, and Connecting with friends old and new $39 Super Early Bird '80's Price by December 31st, 2015 $59 Early Bird Ticket by June 15th 2016 $79 Regular Ticket after June 15th Sunday, July 24th Fun in the sun at Miraleste High School ~ 10 a.m.-4 p.m. No cost to attend; bring your picnic. All are invited to casually gather on Friday night, July 22nd for the "pre-party"  at Nelson's Restaurant in Terranea (where Marineland used to be). Starting around 6ish. This weekend will be totally gnarly, radical, and very bitchin'--all in a great way. Contact: Jenny B. (McCandlish) Jones text/call 805-234-7279 or heyjenny@gmail.com Please inform of any food allergies and/or other requests, thanks! Discounted hotel list, maps, and other activities to follow. Tickets can be purchased on Eventbrite under: MHS Class of 1986 Reunion
